Methods

TestSetAndGetIsFillEnabled()

Tests setting and getting the IsFillEnabled property to ensure it returns the correct value.

[TestMethod]
public void TestSetAndGetIsFillEnabled()

Examples

bool newFillState = true;
ProgramGlobalVariables.IsFillEnabled = newFillState;
Assert.AreEqual(newFillState, ProgramGlobalVariables.IsFillEnabled);

Remarks

This test verifies that the IsFillEnabled property behaves as expected when toggled on or off.

Tests setting and getting the MaxX property to ensure it returns the correct value.

[TestMethod]
public void TestSetAndGetMaxX()

Examples

int newMaxX = 800;
ProgramGlobalVariables.MaxX = newMaxX;
Assert.AreEqual(newMaxX, ProgramGlobalVariables.MaxX);

Remarks

This test validates that the MaxX property correctly stores and retrieves the value assigned to it.
